__e: My father worked for the same factory for 32 years.
I visited a factory not far. I made a turning to see you.
Never get a chance to know what the fuck you are in some factory in Ohio.
But the same guy also owns a manufacturing plant... that you guys say that it's cheaper than any other place?
Well, I think if I was going to murder someone... I wouldn't do it in a factory that was crawling with police.
My father worked in a mill just like everybody else.
- There was nothing to return to. - I worked in a factory. When I turned 1 8 in the Kielce Province then.
Worked in a shop or a factory? Had a wife and children?
I have rope and a knife in my bag because I work in a factory. And often need them.
